# ui-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                | Type                              | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether button should be disabled          | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `size`     | `size`     | Whether the button size is big or small    | `"big" \| "small"`                | `'big'`     |
| `theme`    | `theme`    | Whether the button theme is primary or not | `"primary" \| "secondary"`        | `'primary'` |
| `type`     | `type`     | Type of the button                         | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"` | `'button'`  |


## Events

| Event        | Description                             | Type                |
| ------------ | --------------------------------------- | ------------------- |
| `clickEvent` | Emit event to parent component on click | `CustomEvent<void>` |
